name: fh_iee_devkopsys_base_scenario_emissionen
title: Overview of the emissions in scenario "Fh IEE DeVKopSys" ("Investigation of development paths in the transport sector in feedback with other sectors of the energy system") (base scenario)
description: This table gives an overview of the emissions in scenario "Fh IEE DeVKopSys" ("Investigation of development paths in the transport sector in feedback with other sectors of the energy system") (base scenario). It contains the total amount of greenhouse gas emissions in Germany
keywords: Investigation of development paths in the transport sector in feedback with other sectors of the energy system

context.fundingAgency: Bundesministerium für Umwelt, Naturschutz und nukleare Sicherheit
